alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Jackson; Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 9:07PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caldwell, southeastern Jackson and central Ouachita Parishes through 1000 PM CDT... At 906 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles southwest of Brownsville-Bawcom, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Chatham, Eros, Drew, Fondale, Vixen, Millhaven, Folksville, Cheniere, Mineral Springs, Caderville, Pine Grove, Luna and Lapine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
